io.amcp.core

Class AgentState

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.amcp.core.AgentState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class AgentState
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents the serializable state of an agent for persistence and migration. Contains all information needed to recreate the agent in another context.
    Since:
    AMCP 1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
